column2: please allow me to explain: The "Irrashai" greeting is an integral part of our corporate culture here at JINYA. As a Japanese company that came to the U.S. nearly 10 years ago
column3: JINYA integrated many service customs that you will find in Japan today. In particular
column4: in almost every place of business and especially in restaurants
column5: staff are trained to yell greetings ("Irrashai") to show their enthusiasm and genki spirit -- genki (元気) is a common Japanese word that means "energetic
